result.eng: Communism was on its last legs in 1989.
result.ga: bhí an cumannachas ar an dé deiridh i 1989
result.orig: Bhí an cumannachas ar an dé deiridh i 1989

result.eng: The poor old woman is on her last legs.
result.ga: tá an tseanbhean bhocht ar an dé deiridh
result.orig: Tá an tseanbhean bhocht ar an dé deiridh
result.html: tá an tseanbhean bhocht ar an dé deiridhThe poor old woman is on her last legs.
